org.mini2Dx.tiled

Class TiledObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.tiled.TiledObject

  • public class TiledObject
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an object loaded from a TiledMap

      • toPoint

        public Point toPoint()
        Creates a new Point from this object. Warning: If this object's shape is not TiledObjectShape.POINT, an exception will be thrown.
        Returns:
        A new Point

      • toCircle

        public Circle toCircle()
        Creates a new Circle from this object. Warning: If this object's shape is not TiledObjectShape.ELLIPSE, an exception will be thrown.
        Returns:
        A new Circle

      • toRectangle

        public Rectangle toRectangle()
        Creates a new Rectangle from this object. Warning: If this object's shape is not TiledObjectShape.RECTANGLE, an exception will be thrown.
        Returns:
        A new Rectangle

        Returns:
        A new Polygon

      • toPolyline

        public com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Array<Point> toPolyline()
        Creates a new Array of Points from this object. Warning: If this object's shape is not TiledObjectShape.POLYLINE, an exception will be thrown.
        Returns:
        A new Array of Points in the line
